description: It is well know we are starting a new Bondage website called Bondagetrials.com. We have been searching for a rigger, Webmaster for this site. The following EXTRA BONUS weekend update is a video job interview if you will. We wanted to see their rope skills, and presence. We decided to use Hogtied as venue for the material. Have a nice weekend..
title: Lochai, Blaze and Mika Tan
